sentence: He refused because: “I respect the game too much to do that.” While many of the moves the franchise made that season — trading Laremy Tunsil, Kenny Stills, Kiko Alonso and Minkah Fitzpatrick, releasing a number of veterans to clear cap space and starting players claimed off waivers or signed off another team’s practice squad after three days of practice — seemingly aligned with an organization’s attempts to tank, Flores said he viewed those personnel decisions as “a challenge.” His theory is that his defiance ruined his relationship with Ross, general manager Chris Grier and CEO Tom Garfinkel.
author: Tribune News Service
title: Omar Kelly: Brian Flores discusses lawsuit, never agreeing to tank and his relationship with Tua

sentence: He refused because: “I respect the game too much to do that.” While many of the moves the franchise made that season — trading Laremy Tunsil, Kenny Stills, Kiko Alonso and Minkah Fitzpatrick, releasing a number of veterans to clear cap space and starting players claimed off waivers or signed off another team’s practice squad after three days of practice — seemingly aligned with an organization’s attempts to tank, Flores said he viewed those personnel decisions as “a challenge.” His theory is that his defiance ruined his relationship with Ross, general manager Chris Grier and CEO Tom Garfinkel.
author: Tribune News Service
title: Omar Kelly: Brian Flores discusses lawsuit, never agreeing to tank and his relationship with Tua

sentence: The move also reunites Flores with Steelers safety Minkah Fitzpatrick, whose career has taken off in Pittsburgh since being traded from the Dolphins during Flores’ first year in Miami.
author: Tribune News Service
title: Former Dolphins coach Brian Flores finds next landing spot

sentence: Names such as Marcus Mariota and Ryan Fitzpatrick have been linked to the Bills as possible replacements for Trubisky, but an unexpected player suddenly added himself to that list on Thursday, March 10.
author: Emily Bicks
title: Bills Could Possibly Sign QB Colin Kaepernick as Josh Allen’s Backup

sentence: “He’s a free agent so, yeah, there’s guys out there with experience like I said [Blaine] Gabbert, [Ryan] Fitzpatrick, Geno [Smith], he’s one of ’em,” Schneider said of the team’s potential interest.
author: Jonathan Adams
title: Seahawks Make Likely Decision on Colin Kaepernick: Report
